main event: Two soldiers at Misawa Air Base in Japan reported observing three unidentified flying objects, with the sighting lasting two minutes each.
interesting points: The objects were described as having two blue flashes and one red color 'flash'.
The flashes were observed at approximately 2100-2230 hours, with a burst, fanning out into a spray, and then fading.
The objects were estimated to reach an altitude of 35,000-40,000 feet and appeared to be approximately 1 mile north of the observers.
The report mentions a second flash approximately 20 minutes after the first, and another flash that seemed to go as high into the air.
The document is marked as 'UNCLASSIFIED' and includes a stamp indicating declassification after 12 years.
